briefTitle: (ACORD Study) - A Study of NeoRecormon (Epoetin Beta) in Patients With Early Diabetic Nephropathy
officialTitle: An Open, Randomized, Multi-centre Trial to Investigate the Effect of Anemia Correction on Cardiac Structure and Function in Patients With Early Diabetic Nephropathy
summary: This study will assess the effect of anemia correction with NeoRecormon on cardiac structure and function in patients with early diabetic nephropathy. The anticipated time on study treatment is 1-2 years and the target sample size is 100-500 individuals.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline in Left Ventricle Mass Index (LVMI) at Month 15
